name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parental Search - Keep your kids safe

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parental Search uses AI to protect your children from harmful content online. It's free and easy to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Parental Search uses AI to protect your children from harmful content online.

The AI will detect potentially dangerous words in your online searches and block the search results related to those harmful terms.

It's free and easy to use.

ðŸ‘‰ Parental Search works for searches on Google/Bing/Yahoo
ðŸ‘‰ To stop your children from uninstalling the extension, it won't appear in the extensions list. If you really need to uninstall Parental Search, right click the extension's icon and choose "Remove from Chrome"

Privacy Policy: https://ai.parentalsearch.xyz/privacy
EULA: https://ai.parentalsearch.xyz/eula
